axiom_tree.root: Belief coherence resolves dissonance, amplifying conatus in finite modes.
branches: Pantheism's monism minimizes dualisms, overrepresented in genii.
Deism's rational theism distinct but low-pop, high per capita potential.
Atheism's naturalism scores high (50/50 in beliefCoherence), broad unaffiliated base.

networked_insights.insight_summary: Pantheism's extreme per capita skew (1,000/M) due to tiny population, elite appeal.
networked_insights.insight_details: Corrected pop ~10K (from tools: Canada 1,855, UK 1,000, global extrap); 10 genii (e.g., Spinoza) yields 1,000/M—highest. Novel relative to prior 0.2/M overestimate; aligns with coherence (45/50 score). Collider: Maps to niso_spinoza_2.json's modal integration.
networked_insights.practical_utility: Promote pantheistic ethics for cognitive harmony in education/AI training.
networked_insights.associated_factors: Risk: Mislabeling as atheism; variable: Cultural secularism.
networked_insights.categorization_utility: Differentiates monistic vs. dualistic systems for genius clustering.
networked_insights.generalization_potential: Adapt to AI: Recursive unity models for ethical striving.
networked_insights.limitations: Pop estimates fuzzy (non-institutional); small genius n.
networked_insights.evolution_notes: Evolve with 2030 censuses for growth tracking.
networked_insights.bias_check: Affirm skew/deny mass appeal/both in niche elites/neither dissolved in monistic invariants.

networked_insights.insight_summary: Deism separated: ~6.67/M with conservative 750K pop, rational coherence attracts genii.
networked_insights.insight_details: Tools lump deists in unaffiliated (1.9B), but explicit ~0.5-1M; 5 genii (e.g., Paine) yields 6.67/M. Known overlap with Enlightenment figures; distinct from pantheism's immanence. Collider: High resolution of paradoxes (similar to ATHE's 10/10).
networked_insights.practical_utility: Deistic frameworks for AI ethics: Design without micromanagement.
networked_insights.associated_factors: Risk: Decline in organized deism; variable: Secular trends.
networked_insights.categorization_utility: Groups rational theisms apart from monisms.
networked_insights.generalization_potential: To science: Natural law models in cosmology.
networked_insights.limitations: Pop data scarce; historical bias in genius assignment.
networked_insights.bias_check: Affirm rationality/deny popularity/both in elite draw/neither resolved in theistic invariants.

networked_insights.insight_summary: Atheism/Unaffiliated stable at 0.079/M (0.3 for core atheists), high coherence scores.
networked_insights.insight_details: Pop 1.9B (tools: Pew 2025); atheists subset 450-500M; 150 genii yields rates. Known from beliefCoherence (perfect 50/50); collider: Entropy reduction in niso_information_theory.json.
networked_insights.associated_factors: Risk: Social stigma; variable: Education levels.
networked_insights.bias_check: Affirm consistency/deny universality/both in empirical fit/neither dissolved in naturalistic space.

networked_insights.insight_summary: Niche systems like Falun Gong low (0.1/M), poor empirics drag scores.
networked_insights.insight_details: Pop ~10M (estimated adherents); 1 genius yields 0.1/M. From beliefCoherence: Low 17/50 total, conflicts with science. Known low predictive success (1/10).
networked_insights.practical_utility: Cautionary for ungrounded beliefs in enhancement protocols.
networked_insights.associated_factors: Risk: Authority bias; variable: Persecution effects.
networked_insights.generalization_potential: To ethics: Avoid revelation over evidence.
networked_insights.bias_check: Affirm ethics/deny science fit/both in moral appeals/neither resolved in empirical checks.
